actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to undertake a study of the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve.

summary.text: Instructs the Secretary of Energy to study and report to Congress on the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve similar to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to undertake a study of the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve.
